definitions.body: :Ec 10:15 (against Albr:ZAW xvi (1896), 113, v. Kö:Synt. § 249 m) trouble, labour, toil (on this form as abstr. v. Lag:BN 143 Ba:NB 105);—´[[ע]] Nu 23:21 +; cstr. [[עֲמַל]] Ju Jdg 10:16 +; sf. [[עֲמָלִי]] Ge 41:51 +, etc.;—

trouble, mischief, as done to others: ‖[[שׁׂד ]] Pr 24:2; ´[[יׁחֵר ע]] Ps 94:20; ‖[[רָע]] Hb Hab 1:13; [[בְראׂשׁוֹ]] ´[[יׇשׁוּב ע]] Ps 7:17; [[וׇאָָוֶן]] ´[[ע]] Ps 10:7; ´[[און וע]] Ps 55:11; ‖[[אָוֶן]] Is 10:1, Is 59:4, Hb Hab 1:3, Ps 7:15, Job 4:8, Job 15:35; [[עֲמַל שְׂפָתֵימוֹ]] Ps 140:10 mischief of their lips.

toil, labour (late in Heb.): Ec 2:10, Ec 2:10, Ec 2:21, Ec 2:24, Ec 3:13, Ec 4:4, Ec 4:6, Ec 4:8, Ec 4:9, Ec 5:14, Ec 5:18, Ec 6:7, Ec 8:15, Ec 10:15; c. [[עָמַל]] (q. v.) Ec 1:3, Ec 2:11, Ec 2:19, Ec 2:20, Ec 5:17; [[עָמֵל]] ([[שֶׁאֲנִי שְׁהוּא]] ´[[ע]] Ec 2:18, Ec 2:22; [[אֲשֶׁר עָמֵל]] ´[[ע]] Ec 9:9; = fruit of labour, [[לְאֻמִּים יִירָָשׁוּ]] ´[[ע]] Ps 105:44; [[לִבָּם]] ´[[וַיַּכְנַע בע]] Ps 107:12 he humbled their mind by toil.
